text: @drdavidsamadi They knew that any flu especially #COVID19 was deadly when it comes to our elderly so why did they have the #NursingHomeSlaughter happen if not to boost #DeathToll? These are questions that the @TheJusticeDept needs to investigate & prosecute! @FBI should be confiscating servers!
